name: Solar System Simulator (Selecta Games)
description:
Solar System Made with Unity 3D. I added these things:

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Earth
  4. Moon
  5. Mars
  6. Jupiter
  7. Saturn
  8. Uranus
  9. Neptune
  10. Pluto

Click on a Planet to follow his movement.

There are only windows and web builds for now, but other builds are coming.

Credits

Made by Selecta Games.
